channel.title: Abyssal Dagger Custom Item Help! please :)
channel.description:
Hello guys I need help with my custom item i added, the "Abyssal Dagger".
#1 The dagger looks perfect in my inventory slot, and under my sword slot in equipment tab, But once i wear it i turn invisible. How do i fix this?
#2 When I click on "Show Equipment Stats" The game freezes, and i know it's because under my file in source "Item.cfg" I have the dagger listed like this
[code]item = 13047 Abyssal_dagger A_very_powerful_dagger_from_the_Abyss. 0 0 0 320 320 280 0 0 12 16 7 0 0 112 0[/code]
What is the first three 0's suppose to represent?
#3 When i right click the item it shows the options "Wield, Use, Destroy, Examine", How can i make it say "Wield, Drop, Examine"?
Images -------------
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1y1tAZz.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/70OTgkb.png[/img]
I will love anyone who can help me fix this problem :c

item.title: Abyssal Dagger Custom Item Help! please :)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

  1. It turns invisible because your male/female wield models are incorrect.

  2. The 0’s are Shop value, Low alch, High alch (Should be in that order). Your game freezes because it’s failing to display the model. Refer to #3.

  3. To fix the item actions, in your client, open up ItemDef (or Class8) and search for the item name.

Change the actions listed there with the ones you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Abyssal Dagger Custom Item Help! please :)

item.title: Abyssal Dagger Custom Item Help! please :)
item.dc:creator: @teh_war_of_noobs teh war of noobs
item.description:
@teh_war_of_noobs wrote:

The 3 0’s mean are the buy price, sell price, and high alch price in that order i believe.

For the 3 click options on your dagger make sure you have this in your itemDef.java, somewhere under your model int for the abyssal dagger.

If that doesn’t work, than you probably need to change the case ID for your item cause its probably overlapping an item that has the option to “Wield, use, Destroy, examine”. Not too sure but i hope this helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Abyssal Dagger Custom Item Help! please :)

item.title: Abyssal Dagger Custom Item Help! please :)
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

shop - high alch - low alch

or something like that

Read full topic
